name: Food Judge
description:
Judge Food by pressing the Up and Down Arrow Keys

But be sure to play by the rules displayed on the left side of the screen.

Flip trough the rule pages by using the left and right arrow keys.

Version 0.9 now includes two levels to play trough, with updated Food to judge and better Rules.

I'll keep updating this one trough the week so stay tuned for more updates and improvements^^
